name: nutshell
short_description:
A GUI for the freeware Geographical Information System PCRaster. This is an independent development.

Comes with a map editor "mapedit"

Can make a link with GDAL for conversions.

The GIT repository is available linked to PCRaster and available here: https://sourceforge.net/projects/pcraster/

The code is currently compiled for windows systems but is tested 
under ubuntu.
summary: A GUI for the freeware Geographical Information System PCRaster
